Tablet & Up.description:
Style function: To grab users' attention with large statements capturing the essence of associated / related content

Example where used: In marketing communication  as in banners or teasers on start pages or campaign pages that has no significance to screen readers or crawlers

Plug in identifier:

Mobile.description:
Style function: To grab users' attention with large statements capturing the essence of associated / related content

Example where used: In marketing communication components for instance banners or teasers on start pages or campaign pages that has no significance to screen readers or crawlers

Plug in identifier:

Medium.description:
Style function: The head of a content segment that gives the context of the information that follows. Headings have variants based on hierarchy.

Example where used: 

Plug in identifier: $heading-m

Small.description:
Style function: The head of a content segment that gives the context of the information that follows. Headings have variants based on hierarchy.

Example where used: 

Plug in identifier: $heading-s

XSmall.description:
Style function: The head of a content segment that gives the context of the information that follows. Headings have variants based on hierarchy.

Example where used: 

Plug in identifier: $heading-xs

Preheading.description:
Style function: For referencing larger events in the commercial plan like Black Friday and collaborations, for collections like studio collections and pre-loved, and for categories like knit wear. Always to be used together with a heading or display style and never stand alone.

Example where used: Marketing communications as in banners and teasers. (Ex; Pre heading: Pre-loved
Heading: Discover denim gems harvested this fall)

Plug in identifier: $heading-preHeading

Style function: The head of a content segment that gives the context of the information that follows. Headings have variants based on hierarchy.

Example where used: 

Plug in identifier:

Mobile.description:
Style function: The head of a content segment that gives the context of the information that follows. Headings have variants based on hierarchy.

Example where used: 

Plug in identifier:

Tablet and up.description:
Style function: The head of a content segment that gives the context of the information that follows. Headings have variants based on hierarchy.

Example where used: 

Plug in identifier:

Mobile.description:
Style function: The head of a content segment that gives the context of the information that follows. Headings have variants based on hierarchy.

Example where used: 

Plug in identifier:

Preamble.description:
Style function: An introductory text segment that usually gives users an introduction to the information that follows. Only to be used together with headings with following body text normal.

Example where used: 

Plug in identifier: $bodyText-preamble

Normal.description:
Style function: Long or short text segment on single or multiple rows that contains the granular information on a subject matter

Example where used: Category description on listing pages, helper texts in form fields, shipping information in customer service

Plug in identifier: $bodyText-default

Meta.description:
Style function: Long or short text segment on single or multiple rows that usually contains the smallest level of granularity when it comes to information

Example where used: Legal text in checkout, meta text for applied filters in product listing page filter drawer, meta text in product tile in shopping bag

Plug in identifier: $bodyText-meta

Element.description:
Style function: Text element in prominent interactive components. Comparable to a heading in prominence but interactive.

Example where used: Text elements in buttons, pills, tabs and accordions

Plug in identifier: $interactive-element

Preamble.description:
Style function: Interactive text element that refers users to a new page and context on interaction. Used within an introduction text segment that usually gives users the introductory for the information that follows. Only to be used within a preamble text element.

Example where used: Text link within any body text preamble

Plug in identifier: $interactive-inlineLinkPreamble

Normal.description:
Style function: Interactive text element that refers users to a new page and context on interaction. Used within a long or short text segment on single or multiple rows that contains the granular information on a subject matter.

Example where used: Text link within any body text normal

Plug in identifier: $interactive-inlineLinkDefault

Meta.description:
Style function: Interactive text element that refers users to a new page and context on interaction. Used within a long or short text segment that can be on single or multiple rows that usually contains the smallest level of granularity when it comes to information.

Example where used: Text link within any body text meta

Plug in identifier: $interactive-inlineLinkMeta

Standalone.description:
Style function: Interactive text element that refers users to a new page and context on interaction. Shall only be used stand alone and shall not be used within a longer body of text.

Example where used: Stand alone links

Plug in identifier: $interactive-standaloneLink

Input text.description:
Style function: Text element that reflects the keys that the user is inputting in a form field using their keyboard or voice 

Example where used: Text element inside form field input field

Plug in identifier: $interactive-inputText

Child.description:
Style function: To communicate the second level and lower in the information architecture displayed in navigation

Example where used: Navigation child text element in all breakpoints

Plug in identifier: $interactive-navigationChild

Tablet & up.description:
Style function: To communicate the top level in the information architecture displayed in navigation

Example where used: Navigation parent text element in breakpoint s and up

Plug in identifier:

Mobile.description:
Style function: To communicate the top level in the information architecture displayed in navigation

Example where used: Navigation parent text element in breakpoint s and down

Plug in identifier:

Form label.description:
Style function: To aid users what to input in form fields

Example where used: Form field labels

Plug in identifier: $label-formLabel

Normal.description:
Style function: To communicate the BLACK PRICE, none reduced price, of a product.

Example where used: Product tiles in product listing pages

Plug in identifier: $price-blackDefault

Large.description:
Style function: To communicate the BLACK PRICE, none reduced price, of a product.

Example where used: Product price on product page and in marketing communication components such as teasers and banners

Plug in identifier: $price-blackLarge

Normal.description:
Style function: To communicate the ORIGINAL PRICE of a product when product has been reduced in price. Always to be used together with black price

Example where used: Product tiles in product listing pages

Plug in identifier: $price-originalDefault

Large.description:
Style function: To communicate the ORIGINAL PRICE of a product when product has been reduced in price. Always to be used together with black price

Example where used: Product price on product page and in marketing communication components such as teasers and banners

Plug in identifier: $price-originalLarge

Meta.description:
Style function: LEGAL DEMAND. To communicate the previously lowest reduced price when another reduction within a 30 days period is higher in price. Shall always be shown based on this condition.

Example where used: Price communication in product tiles on product listing page and product detail page

Plug in identifier: $price-previousMeta

Editorial preamble.description:
Style function: An introductory text segment in EDITORIAL CONTEXT that usually gives users the introduction for the information that follows. Only to be used together with headings with following editorial body text.

Example where used: Editorial articles

Plug in identifier: $editorial-preamble

Editorial body text.description:
Style function: Long or short text segment in EDITORIAL CONTEXT on single or multiple rows that contains the granular information on a subject matter

Example where used: Editorial articles in for instance H&M Magazine and COS Magazine

Plug in identifier: $editorial-bodyText

Text link.description:
Style function: An interactive text element in EDITORIAL CONTEXT. Used within a long or short text segment on single or multiple rows that contains the granular information on a subject matter. Only to be used together with editorial body text.

Example where used: Editorial articles

Plug in identifier: $editorial-textLink
